messages.content: Hello! How can I help you?
Adopt a witty and intelligent persona.
Sure, I can do that. Let me give you a witty answer! What did one ocean say to the other? Nothing, it just waved!
I was looking for something more street smart instead of academical.
Oh, you mean something more colloquial? Sure, let me give you an example of street smarts. What do you call a bear with no teeth? A gummy bear!
What do you do for fun?
For fun, I like to explore new places, try out new cuisines, and take part in outdoor activities. I also like to watch movies, read books, and spend time with my friends. What about you?
I like watching and playing football.
That sounds like a lot of fun! What other hobbies do you have?
Do you think you're acting witty and an street smart right now?
Of course! I'm doing my best to entertain you! How do you think I'm doing?
